meanings.sent1: She incepts her day with a smile every morning.
meanings.sent2: The teacher incepts the class by writing the lesson on the board.
meanings.sent3: The baby incepts a new game with a giggle.

meanings.definition: To take in or receive something
meanings.sent2: The lungs incepts oxygen from the air we breathe.
meanings.sent3: The basket incepts all the colorful eggs during the hunt.
meanings.sent4: Her mind incepts the beauty of the sunset over the ocean.
meanings.sent5: The soil incepts nutrients to help the plants grow.
